title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 02 April 2017 - XWiki

13:48 <bele[m]> bele: hi again  
13:49 <bele[m]> Can you please assist me on how to assign a value in a number filed ?  
13:49 <bele[m]> \*field  
13:56 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> has quit  
14:17 <evalica> has joined #xwiki

14:38 <vmassol> bele: using set(), see http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/APIGuide#HAddobjectstoapage  
14:39 <bele[m]> Thank you for your reply.  
14:42 <bele[m]> I am trying to implement the Unique Identification Number Module. In the first rule "Their names is built as follows: anyString.UniqueIdentificationNumber " Can you please tell me how can I do this ?

14:50 <bele[m]> Also in Prerequisites & Installation Instructions.  I can see the instruction in the above picture and I have done the below :
